title: Food Matters: A sociological case study of food and eating across the life course in York c. 1945 - 2010
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText:
Academics: downloads and citations of work. 
Media and Publicity: Local, regional and international press and publicity (radio, BBC online, etc.) Agriculture, Food and Drink,Healthcare,Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections,Other Cultural,Societal,Policy & public services
